rows.label: qst100701_msg0001
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]A question, mo!!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0002
rows.name:
Is the Pignerator Trade Guild
more respectable and famous than
the Avaritia Trade Guild, mo?!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0003
rows.name:
Nu-nu-nu~! No one knows about
the Pignerator Trade Guild, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0004
rows.name:
The Pignerator Trade Guild is one
of the 11 Nopon trade guilds, mo.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0005
rows.name:
Nuinui is the rising star of the
Pignerator Trade Guild, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0006
rows.name:
But since the Avaritia Trade Guild became
successful, the other Nopon trade guilds
have fallen on hard times, mo...

rows.label: qst100701_msg0007
rows.name:
So, to restore Pyrithium
Trade Guild to former glory,
last wish of Nuinui...

rows.label: qst100701_msg0009
rows.name:
is to open the treasure chest that has been
passed down through generations, cash in the
treasure, and make the guild big, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0010
rows.name:
But the crucial Nopon
Doubloon... Momo?!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0011
rows.name:
I smell Nopon Doubloons, mo! Do you
have some, mo? Let me see, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0012
rows.name:
Th-this is! The legendary
Nopon Doubloon, mo!!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0013
rows.name:
It's what's needed to open
the Pignerator Trade Guild's
secret treasure chest, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0014
rows.name:
They say there are 11 Doubloons,
the same number as the guilds, mo.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0015
rows.name:
But they were hidden all over
Alst so the treasure chest
couldn't be opened easily, mo.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0016
rows.name:
When the chest is open, I'll give
you a little bit of the treasure,
so find all 11 Nopon Doubloons, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0017
rows.name:
I'm glad I found such
a greedy person, mo.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0018
rows.name:
Oh, that's not an insult, mo!
'Greedy' is a compliment in the
Pignerator Trade Guild, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0019
rows.name:
As for the location of the Nopon
Doubloons... I know of one, mo.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0020
rows.name:
It's on top of the wooden boxes
stacked in the Central Exchange
of the Avaritia Trade Guild, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0021
rows.name:
Nuinui is bad at jumping, so
I can't get up there, mo...

rows.label: qst100701_msg0022
rows.name:
Including that one, please
collect all 11, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0101
rows.name:
There's one on top of the wooden
boxes stacked in the Central Exchange
of the Avaritia Trade Guild, mo!

rows.label: qst100701_msg0102
rows.name:
There are 11 Nopon Doubloons in
total, mo! When you've collected
them all, come here, mo.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0103
rows.name:
Until then, Nuinui will study
the business techniques of
the hateful Bahn, mo.

rows.label: qst100701_msg0104
rows.name:
To win, you must first
know your enemy, mo!
